name: CheekyExcuses
0:
”Alexa, ask cheeky excuses to give me an excuse”
”Alexa, ask cheeky excuses to give me a dev excuse”
”Alexa, ask cheeky excuses to tell me an excuse”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cheeky excuses
des:
This skill includes 2 categories for excuses at the moment: Normal and Developer. Ask for a excuse for normal, and dev/developer excuse for Developer. Adding more excuses as I get around to it, and planning on adding more categories if it becomes popular. 

Why Developer?
I hear these excuses too much so I created a skill for it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
